titles.title: Defense Law Enforcement Officer Credential Act of 2022
Defense Law Enforcement Officer Credential Act of 2022
To direct the Secretary of Defense to provide for standardized credentials for law enforcement officers of the Department of Defense, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Defense Law Enforcement Officer Credential Act of 2022
This bill requires the Department of Defense (DOD) to ensure that each military department develops a standardized identification credential for DOD law enforcement officers and issues such credentials at no cost to the officers. DOD must ensure that any issued common access card clearly identifies the officer as a DOD law enforcement officer.
